Bold or Italicize labels or levels in gtsummary tables

bold_italicize_labels_levels.Rd

Bold or Italicize labels or levels in gtsummary tables

tab_style_bold_labels(x)

tab_style_bold_levels(x)

tab_style_italicize_labels(x)

tab_style_italicize_levels(x)

Arguments

x

an object created using gtsummary functions

Functions

  • tab_style_bold_labels: Bold labels in gtsummary tables

  • tab_style_bold_levels: Bold levels in gtsummary tables

  • tab_style_italicize_labels: Italicize labels in gtsummary tables

  • tab_style_italicize_levels: Italicize levels in gtsummary tables

Example Output

See also

Other tbl_summary tools: add_comparison, add_n, add_overall, add_q.tbl_summary, add_stat_label, cols_label_summary, inline_text.tbl_summary, tbl_summary

Other tbl_regression tools: add_global.tbl_regression, add_nevent.tbl_regression, inline_text.tbl_regression, tbl_merge, tbl_regression

Other tbl_uvregression tools: add_global.tbl_uvregression, add_nevent.tbl_uvregression, add_q.tbl_uvregression, inline_text.tbl_uvregression, tbl_merge, tbl_uvregression

Examples

tbl_bold_ital_ex <-
  trial %>%
  dplyr::select(trt, age, grade) %>%
  tbl_summary() %>%
  tab_style_bold_labels() %>%
  tab_style_bold_levels() %>%
  tab_style_italicize_labels() %>%
  tab_style_italicize_levels()
